price: вечно ће у казни да остану, а језив терет ће на Судњем дану да носе.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهِۖ وَسَآءَ لَهُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ حِمۡلٗا

version.title: Serbian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Serbian by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhi wasāa lahum yawma al-qiyāmati ḥim'lan
